name: ggplot2 - basics I
description: You want to plot your data, but the R syntax looks to complex? No problem - we have you covered. In this session you will learn the basic grammar of ggplot2 and you will make your first barplot and some errorbars. Ne previous knowledge needed. Some R basic knowledge helps, but we will figure it out together.
teaser: Learn how to design fancy plots with R and ggplot2!

details.Prerequisites: Be curious - some R knowledge helps
